ch.xelaalex.fuzzle

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.xelaalex.fuzzle.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    The equivalent to dictionaries in the python version. Instances of these Objects are used to Store values such as the key and tags but also values the Searcher discovered.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    XelaaleX1234

      • getMatch

        public boolean getMatch()
        Match is set to true if the Key matches perfectly with the Search.
        Returns:
        returns if this instance is a perfect match.

      • setMatch

        public void setMatch(boolean match)
        This value is usually set by the Searcher. If the key is identical with the Search String this value will be set to true.
        Parameters:
        match - returns if this instance is a match.

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy()
        The Accuracy is a value that is Determined by the Searcher. The higher the value the more likely this is the value that was searched for.
        Returns:
        returns the accuracy of this instance.

      • setAccuracy

        public void setAccuracy(double accuracy)
        This Value is usually set by the Searcher. The category of an instance defines for which reason the instance was included into the results.
        Parameters:
        accuracy - assigns a value to the accuracy of this instance.
